Java Code: for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) { sum = sum + i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from 0 to 4\n    sum = sum + i\nend loop

Java Code: for (i = 1; i <= 10; i++) { prod = prod * i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from 1 to 10\n    prod = prod * i\nend loop
loop i from 10 downto 0\n    output = i\nend loop

Java Code: for (i = 0; i < 10; i += 2) { evenSum = evenSum + i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from 0 to 8 step 2\n    evenSum = evenSum + i\nend loop
loop i from 2 to 20 step 3\n    count = count + 1\nend loop

Java Code: for (i = 5; i > 0; i--) { total = total + i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from 5 downto 1\n    total = total + i\nend loop
loop i from 0 to n - 1\n    a[i] = a[i] + 1\nend loop

Java Code: for (i = 1; i <= n; i++) { s = s + i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from 1 to n\n    s = s + i\nend loop

Java Code: for (i = n; i >= 1; i--) { s = s + i; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: loop i from n downto 1\n    s = s + i\nend loop
loop i from 0 to 2\n    output = output + "!"\nend loop
loop while x < 10\n    x = x + 1\nend loop
loop while count > 0\n    count = count - 1\nend loop
loop while notFound\n    tries = tries + 1\nend loop
loop while x <> 0\n    x = x - 1\nend loop

i = 0
loop while i < n
    i = i + 1
end loop
loop while a[i] > 0\n    a[i] = a[i] - 1\nend loop
loop\n    x = x + 1\nuntil x >= 10
loop\n    count = count - 1\nuntil count <= 0
loop\n    inputValid = check()\nuntil inputValid
loop\n    tries = tries + 1\nuntil tries >= maxTries
